resources.string: Put What You Want To tell RoboTexters
This app will not run unless you accept read SMS permission.
This app will not run unless you accept Read Contacts permission.
This app will not run unless you accept the receive messages permission.
We need these permissions in order to properly route sms messages, keep track of your messages and read your contacts so you can input the right numbers.
